hr.foi.air.t18.chatup.Conversation

Class MessagesListAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • hr.foi.air.t18.chatup.Conversation.MessagesListAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter

    public class MessagesListAdapter
extends android.widget.BaseAdapter
    An adapter that lists all available messages in one conversation.
